Application.description: The name or the Id of the Application.
Application.markdownDescription:
The name or the Id of the Application.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: \w+|[a-z0-9]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

Resource.description: The name or the Id of the Resource.
Resource.markdownDescription:
The name or the Id of the Resource.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: \w+|arn:aws[-a-z]*:cloudformation:[a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d:\d{12}:stack/[a-zA-Z][-A-Za-z0-9]{0,127}/[0-9a-f]{8}(-[0-9a-f]{4}){3}-[0-9a-f]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

ResourceType.description: The type of the CFN Resource for now it's enum CFN_STACK.
ResourceType.markdownDescription:
The type of the CFN Resource for now it's enum CFN_STACK.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CFN_STACK  
Update requires: Replacement

ApplicationArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws[-a-z]*:servicecatalog:[a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d:\d{12}:/applications/[a-z0-9]+  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws[-a-z]*:cloudformation:[a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d:\d{12}:stack/[a-zA-Z][-A-Za-z0-9]{0,127}/[0-9a-f]{8}(-[0-9a-f]{4}){3}-[0-9a-f]{12}  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
